channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: An ex-college basketball player testifies that Sean 'Diddy' Combs got 'extremely creative' on drugs
Trump calls for special prosecutor to investigate 2020 election, reviving longstanding grievance
How this startup is helping publishers profit from AI scraping
Sean 'Diddy' Combs trial recap: Ex-assistant Brendan Paul testifies he bought drugs for Combs — but he was no 'drug mule'
Plane Passenger Goes Viral for Video Showing Her Pulling Hair, Spitting on Fellow Flyer Over Seat Dispute
WATCH: ‘I’m pretty lucky’: Teen struck by lightning as thunderstorms hit Northeast
item.description: In New York City, a teenager was struck by lightning in Central Park Thursday afternoon, police said. The boy is alert and conscious, police said.

item.title: Israelis on edge as Iranian missile strikes continue
item.description: Air raid sirens blared across Israel as Iran launched more strikes Friday. Robert Murrett, a professor at Syracuse University, joins with more on how ...

item.title: Trump seeks to delay appeal of $83 million judgment in E. Jean Carroll case
item.description: President Trump has asked an appeals court to delay arguments scheduled for next week in his appeal of the $83 million defamation case brought by E. J...

item.title: Judge orders Columbia University protester Mahmoud Khalil freed from detention
item.description: A federal judge has ordered the U.S. government to free former Columbia University graduate student Mahmoud Khalil from immigration detention.

item.title: Israel-Iran live updates: Iranian FM open to continue discussions after Geneva talks
item.description: UK, France and Germany said there were no major breakthroughs on Friday.

item.title: Mahmoud Khalil ordered released by federal judge
item.description: A federal judge has ordered the release of Columbia University pro-Palestinian activist Mahmoud Khalil.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump calls for special prosecutor for 2020 election
item.description: Trump took to Truth Social Friday morning to again make unverified claims that the 2020 election was fraudulent and called for a special prosecutor.

item.title: Maps show forecast for looming heat wave
item.description: The National Weather Service called the forecast for above-average temperatures "the first significant heat wave this season."

item.title: CDC reports jump in high blood pressure deaths linked to excessive drinking
item.description: A new report from the CDC shows a jump in high blood pressure deaths linked to excessive drinking.

item.title: Iranian-American describes what family in Iran, U.S. is experiencing amid Israeli airstrikes

item.title: California argues in court against Trump’s National Guard deployment
Judge orders release of Columbia activist Mahmoud Khalil from ICE detention
item.description: A federal judge in New Jersey on Friday ordered that Columbia University activist Mahmoud Khalil must be released from detention.

item.title: Juneteenth celebrations across the US commemorate the end of slavery
